CustomField.description:
Indicates overall state of Year Up's connection with an individual - not what we do with the person (eg, solicit donations vs engage in our program), just how "live" a connection we have.
- Business & general contacts, with record type "Individual," use values: {Nurture-Suspect, Active, Inactive, Do Not Contact, Duplicate, No Longer At Company, Deceased, Active Prospect/Donor}
- Donor management, two impt values are Nurture-Suspect & Active. We mark a new contact as Nurture-Suspect at the beginning of a relationship. An Active donor has contributed. There are no validation rules or restrictions on assignment of values. (QUESTION: does “Active Prospect/Donor” have meaning?)
- Prospective & current students, use values: {Active, Do Not Contact, Duplicate, No Longer At Company, Deceased}. These categories overlap w/status on student's current Engagement. At present, use Engagement Status for reporting.
(CE doesn’t use Contact Status, last cked Spr ‘16)
- SB 1/4/17
CustomField.label: Contact Status
